Line1.7FA05: Ah, the old workshop. Lorath, Elias, and I would spend days on end cooped up in here. Experimenting, debating.
Line3.7FA05: Nothing to hold us back but our own imaginations...and how much of each other we could tolerate.
VoiceDir1.7FA05: Hint of nostalgia. Being here brings back memories. Downplay the very last sentence, almost like an aside.
